00019 class TipdBasedActiveWaitDispatcher : public StackMsgActiveWaitDispatcher {
00020 
00021     typedef StackMsgActiveWaitDispatcher Base;
00022 
00023     public:
00024         enum AbortCause {
00025             UserAbort,      // the user aborted the active wait loop
00026             RemoteAbort,    // a remote event aborted the active wait loop
00027             NotSpecified    // the cause for the abort is not specified
00028         };
00029 
00031         TipdBasedActiveWaitDispatcher(Tipd tipd);
00032         
00034         virtual ~TipdBasedActiveWaitDispatcher() {}
00035 
00038         BOOLEAN IsEqualTipd(Tipd tipd) const { return m_tipd == tipd; }
00039 
00043         virtual void AbortIfEqualTipd(Tipd tipd, AbortCause cause = NotSpecified);
00044         
00046         AbortCause GetAbortCause() const { return m_cause; }
00047 
00048     protected:
00050         Tipd GetTipd() const { return m_tipd; }

00054
